meanings.definition: A type of jacket that is loose-fitting and gathered at the waist.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish blouson to stay warm in the cool breeze.
meanings.sent2: The blousons on display at the store were colorful and trendy.
meanings.sent3: The blousons hanging in the closet danced in the air when the window was open.
meanings.sent4: Her blouson was like a cozy hug on a chilly day.
meanings.sent5: The blouson's unique design made it stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: To wear or put on a blouson jacket.
meanings.sent1: He blousons up before heading out for a walk in the park.
meanings.sent2: She always blousons her favorite jacket when going out with friends.
meanings.sent3: The magician blousoned on his blouson in a blink of an eye!
meanings.sent4: Like a superhero, she blousoned into her blouson and rushed to the rescue.
meanings.sent5: Before the party, he blousoned up to impress everyone with his style.
